Service

  • In the 2019–2020 academic year I am organizing a reading group on a to-be-determined topic related to geometric group theory.

  • I am a co-organizer of the Tufts Directed Reading Program.

  • I am one of two stewards representing the Math department in the graduate student union.

  • In 2018, I was Treasurer of the Organization of Graduate Students in Mathematics, the department’s graduate student organization.

  • In 2017, I was the Math department representative to the Tufts graduate student council.

  • In 2017, I was a graduate student member of the university-wide Committee on Curricula.

  • In 2016, I mentored Ruth Meadow-MacLeod in a Directed Reading Program project on the topic of the Banach–Tarski Paradox.
